translation.en: I know what happens when you die?

♪ If you wanna be my lover ♪

Not people that the government tells you are evil,
because based on, you know, policies or politics and bureaucracy or trade relations or any of that shit.

translation.en: he heard as a kid about his grandfather.

From now on, you will be known as Seven.

translation.en: [One] There's this trick that we all do to get through our day.

translation.en: We take a box and into that box, we place all the horrors of the world,

translation.en: all the wrongs humans do to one another.
translation.it: tutti i torti che gli umani si fanno l'un l'altro.

translation.en: And then we close the box and pretend it doesn't exist.

translation.en: Only some of us spend too much time inside the box.
translation.it: Ma alcuni di noi passano troppo tempo dentro la scatola.

translation.en: We've lost our ability to pretend.
translation.it: Abbiamo perso la capacità di fingere.

translation.en: We know there's too much unfinished business

Ci sono troppe questioni in sospeso al mondo. LEVATEVI DAL CAZZO

translation.en: And we do it from here.
It's a lot like the Batcave, except it's nothing like the Batcave.
translation.it: È come la Batcaverna, ma è del tutto diversa.

translation.en: You're gonna be restricted to cities that you've never visited before. People that you've never met.

translation.en: All, of course, except your fellow ghosts.
None of whom you'll know by name, only number, for safety,

translation.en: and so no one gets too close.
This is our target hit board.
These nine men have been placing too much shit inside the box.

translation.en: So, now, they answer to us.
the dictator of Turgistan, Rovach Alimov.

Don't look at me like that. I'm fucking American.
Fuck you, high blood pressure. I'll eat whatever the fuck I want. Thank you very much.

Equal vibrating phones, ten million cell phones... -[cell phone ringing] -...Priuses, Teslas, all use my ingenuity.

translation.en: You guys, you got it all wrong, you know.
I mean, we're all gonna die.

El Día de los Muertos. The Day of the Dead.

[sucks teeth] So, we're all gonna die?

Niente malati o amputati, niente di deprimente.

translation.en: Start the engines. Prepare to leave.
translation.it: Avviate i motori. Pronti a partire!

translation.en: Take the wheel! Take the wheel!
Lock the boat down. Everyone, strap on body armor,
translation.it: Mettete in sicurezza la barca, indossate i giubbotti

translation.en: and tell the captain let's get going.
translation.it: e dite al capitano di andare!

translation.en: [captain] Captain of the Kismet. I need military escort.
translation.it: Capitano della Kismet, richiedo una scorta.

translation.en: Not so fast. We're gonna stay and party. Get down.
translation.it: Non così in fretta, restiamo qui.

translation.en: Down. Get down. On your knees.
-All right. -Show me your hands, por favor.
translation.it: - Ok. - Mostrami le mani, por favor.

translation.en: [man, on radio] This is Turgistan security on the Kismet. Pirates have just--
translation.it: Qui sicurezza del Turghistan sulla Kismet. I pirati hanno...

translation.en: We must target him not where he is strong but where he's weak.
translation.it: Non dobbiamo colpirlo dov'è forte, ma dove è debole.

translation.en: Hospitals, to take away his safety.
translation.it: Gli ospedali, per privarlo della sicurezza.

translation.en: Schools, to take away his future.
translation.it: Le scuole, per privarlo del futuro.
I giovani, per soffocare la speranza.

translation.en: -[Rovach] Commence gas attack. -Get out of my way.
So you don't have to kill your own people again.
translation.it: Per non uccidere più la vostra gente.

translation.en: Tell the military to back away from that boat.
translation.it: Dite all'esercito di allontanarsi dalla barca.

translation.en: Together, we will bring peace to our beloved country.
translation.it: Insieme porteremo la pace nel nostro amato Paese.

translation.en: Guards have chest armor. Yes, they do.
translation.it: - Le guardie hanno i giubbotti. - Sì, è vero.

translation.en: [Seven] We got the fancy composite Kevlar. I hope this works, man.
translation.it: Noi il kevlar composito. - Spero funzioni. - Funzionerà.

translation.en: -[One] It'll work. -They have some fancy food up there.
translation.it: - Spero funzioni. - Funzionerà. - Hanno ottimo cibo, eh? - Sì? Dimmi tutto.

translation.en: Really? Tell me more about that. Don't hold back.
translation.it: - Hanno ottimo cibo, eh? - Sì? Dimmi tutto. Non trattenerti.

translation.en: This fish soup they call... labu... labuan...
translation.it: C'è questa zuppa di pesce che chiamano... ...labu, labuan.

translation.en: It's so delicious, man. They put this little cheese on it.
translation.it: È squisita, ci mettono il formaggio...

translation.en: Does it have to be on the walkie-talkie? And we're all standing right here. Yeah?
translation.it: Dobbiamo usare il walkie-talkie? Siamo tutti qui insieme. Sì?

translation.en: Don't you give me attitude, okay?
Don't scratch my boat with your guns. It cost me one billion manat.
translation.it: Non graffiatemi la barca. È costata un miliardo di manat!

translation.en: [One, in English] When I pop this, the magnet pulse lasts for 15 seconds.
translation.it: Ok, quando premo questo, l'impulso magnetico dura 15 secondi.

translation.en: Welcome to the world's biggest magnet.
translation.it: È il più grande magnete del mondo!

translation.en: I was thinking that when this is over, I want you to meet my mother, yes?
translation.it: Quando sarà finita, voglio che tu conosca mia madre, ok?

translation.en: [laughs] Oh, God. You didn't say that.
I found the back doors to Rovach's suite.
I can't just fix it, all right? The phone is very fucking complicated.
translation.it: Non posso sistemarlo, ok? Il telefono è complicato, cazzo!

translation.en: No. No, no, no, no. No, no. Go. Go, go, go.
-Sir, please, we must leave right now. -Hungry. I went for a dip.
translation.it: - Dobbiamo andare. - Ho fame. Sono un ospite importante.
- Dobbiamo andare. - Ho fame. Sono un ospite importante. - Ho nuotato. - Signore, dobbiamo...

translation.en: I just went for a dip, all right?
I would love to meet your mother.
translation.it: Sarei felice di conoscere tua madre.

translation.en: -What the fuck? -Put the phone down, and use your gun.
translation.it: - Ma che cazzo? - Metti giù il telefono e spara!

translation.en: I got it, I got it! I got it!
Holy shit! I mean, I wasn't sure it would work.
translation.it: Porca puttana! Non sapevo se avrebbe funzionato.

translation.en: I mean, I wasn't "sure" sure. I had a suspicion, but I, uh...
translation.it: Cioè, non ero sicuro. Avevo dei sospetti, ma...

translation.en: God, this is all so fucking dangerous.
Hey, hey! You like that phone now, motherfucker?
translation.it: Ehi! Ora ti piace quel telefono, stronzo?

translation.en: Stop fucking around. We gotta find Rovach.
[in English] Jesus. What did you do?
Don't look at me. She's the evil one.
translation.it: Non guardare me, è lei la cattiva.
- Sei stata tu? - Sì, perché? Se non ci muoviamo, li preleveranno.

translation.en: -they're gonna pull them from the boat. -You're sick.
translation.it: Se non ci muoviamo, li preleveranno. Sei malata!
- La barca si muove. - Non va bene.

translation.en: -Magnet! Where is the magnet? -[Seven] They're getting their guns!
translation.it: - Dov'è il magnete? - Prendono le armi!

translation.en: Shit. They got our position. We need to move.
translation.it: Sanno la nostra posizione, dobbiamo muoverci.

translation.en: Honestly, I didn't think we'd make it this far.
translation.it: Non credevo saremmo arrivati fin qui.

translation.en: [Four] Five, find Rovach. I'll distract the guards.
translation.it: Cinque, trova Rovach. Distraggo le guardie.

translation.en: I've got four guys on me. I'm on the upper deck, and I'm screwed.
translation.it: Ne ho addosso quattro. Sono sul ponte e sono fregato.

translation.en: Oh, no.Wait. Wait. I got it.
-[both exclaim] -I almost shot you right in the head.
translation.it: Ti ho quasi sparato in testa.

translation.en: Goddamn it. You go eat some food.
-[Two] I'm in Rovach's stateroom. -[Rovach speaking Turkmen]
-[in English] Get me to the rescue boat. -One.
Rovach is leaving with a guard.
translation.it: Uno, Rovach se ne va con una guardia.

translation.en: What do you want me to do?
Get me out of this boat.
Anybody got eyes on the target?
I don't know my 20. Stay off the channel. I'm going for Four.
translation.it: Lascia libero il canale. Vado da Quattro.

translation.en: -Four, where you at, buddy? -[Seven] You're breaking your own rules.
translation.it: - Quattro, dove sei? - Stai violando le tue regole.

translation.en: I thought you didn't have a family.
It's a big ship. Say something, pal.
translation.it: È una nave grande, dimmi qualcosa.

translation.en: Look, Bond, you gotta get here fast.
It's a TV show. Come on, let's go.
translation.it: È una serie TV. Dai, andiamo.

translation.en: As fast as she can fly to the villa in Dezar.
translation.it: Il più veloce possibile alla villa a Dezar.

translation.en: I was thinking of somewhere else.

translation.it: - Ehi! - Ti faccio saltare la testa!

translation.en: [reporter1] In Turgistan, we're witnessing a regime change. [reporter 2] We're following a major breaking story.
translation.it: In Turghistan stiamo assistendo a un cambio di regime.

translation.en: [reporter 4] Countries around the world are now mobilizing to give them help.
translation.it: Il mondo si sta mobilitando per aiutarli.

translation.en: Refugee camps are emptying. It's an amazing sight to see.
translation.it: I campi profughi si stanno svuotando.

translation.en: [reporter 5] We're following a major breaking story.
[reporter 4] We understand now that they're dropping Rovach off to rebels.
translation.it: Sappiamo che stanno consegnando Rovach ai ribelli.
- Benvenuto al quinto atto. - Lo sapevo.

translation.en: You didn't listen to me, Brother.
I have no idea what happens when you die.
translation.it: Non so cosa succede quando si muore.
La morte è ancora un mistero.

translation.en: Oh, we can do some shit...
They say that your soul departs when you pass.
translation.it: Dicono che quando muori, la tua anima se ne va.

translation.en: Well, for us, it was the opposite.
translation.it: Beh, per noi è stato il contrario.
Il momento in cui niente da perdere...

translation.en: I am one... but not done.
translation.it: Io sono Uno... ma non ho finito.

translation.en: Next time, can we just knock off a fucking casino?
translation.it: La prossima volta, possiamo rapinare un casinò?
